title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed primarily on the Frontend using Vue.js for a startup’s optical products marketplace tailored to scientists.
keyContributions: Redesigned Product Filters: Overhauled the product filtering system, adding advanced options like range selectors and checklists to improve user experience.
Quote Request Functionality: Implemented a new feature for customers to request production cost quotes, using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, CloudWatch, and Node.js.
Category View Implementation: Developed new category views, transforming Figma designs into functional frontend pages that enhanced user navigation.
Blog Structure Revamp: Restructured the blog’s menu and article layout, improving content accessibility and overall user experience.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Client-side development with React v17.0, Redux, Hooks, Typescript, Jest, and Tailwind CSS. Angular v13.0 with Material UI and Karma. Development in REST APIs with Node.js, Express, Swagger UI. MVC/DDD with PHP using Symfony and Yii2 frameworks.
keyContributions: Deployment and management of Docker containers, large-scale orchestration with Kubernetes.
Managing, querying, and optimizing databases using MySQL and Postgres/Redshift.
Cloud services management in an AWS environment, including SQS queues and S3.
Experience in project coordination and the hiring process.
